IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 16:01 IST
 Indian Institute of Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Jharkhand |  Salary : 42,000 to 50,400




FOLLOW

The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Dhanbad has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. can apply for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Jharkhand.

IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria.
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellow 	01	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech

Age Limit for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 42,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 50,400 / per month.

Application fee for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IIT Dhanbad Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	11-08-2025
Last Date of Application	22-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
